info.description:
REST API for Thola.

For more information look at our Github : https://github.com/inexio/thola
info.title: Thola

post.summary: Checks if identify matches the expectations.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Check to read out interface metrics.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Prints all available metrics for a device as performance data.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.
Returns an error with more details in the body.
Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Checks whether a UPS device has its main voltage applied.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

200.description: Returns the device which was found.

400.description: Returns a string that the request was formatted wrong.

404.description: Returns a string that no device was found.

post.summary: Returns the available components for the device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Counts the interfaces of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Reads out data of the interfaces of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Reads out UPS data of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

BaseRequest.description: BaseRequest is a generic request that is processed by thola

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

BaseResponse.description: BaseResponse defines attributes every response has.
BaseResponse.title: BaseResponse

CheckDeviceRequest.description: CheckDeviceRequest is a the request struct for the check device request.
CheckDeviceRequest.title: CheckDeviceRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

CheckIdentifyRequest.description: CheckIdentifyRequest is a the request struct for the check identify request.
CheckIdentifyRequest.title: CheckIdentifyRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

CheckInterfaceMetricsRequest.description: CheckInterfaceRequest is a the request struct for the check interface metrics request.
CheckInterfaceMetricsRequest.title: CheckInterfaceMetricsRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

CheckMetricsRequest.description: CheckRequest is a the request struct for the check metrics request.
CheckMetricsRequest.title: CheckMetricsRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

CheckRequest.description: CheckRequest is a generic response struct for the check request.
CheckRequest.title: CheckRequest

CheckResponse.description: CheckResponse is a generic response struct for the check plugin format.
CheckResponse.title: CheckResponse

CheckSNMPRequest.description: CheckSNMPRequest is a the request struct for the check snmp request.
CheckSNMPRequest.title: CheckSNMPRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

CheckTholaServerRequest.description: CheckTholaServerRequest is the request struct for the check thola server request.
CheckTholaServerRequest.title: CheckTholaServerRequest

CheckUPSRequest.description: CheckUPSRequest is a the request struct for the check ups request.
CheckUPSRequest.title: CheckUPSRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

ConnectionData.description: ConnectionData includes all connection data for a device
ConnectionData.title: ConnectionData

Device.description:
Device represents a device and has the same structure as Response.
Response can possibly be removed and replaced by Device.
Device.title: Device

DeviceData.description: DeviceData includes all data that can be used to contact a device
DeviceData.title: DeviceData

EthernetLikeInterface.description: EthernetLikeInterface represents an ethernet like interface

HTTPConnectionData.description: HTTPConnectionData includes all http connection data for a device
HTTPConnectionData.title: HTTPConnectionData

auth_password.description: The password for authorization on the device

auth_username.description: The username for authorization on the device

http_ports.description: The http port(s) of the device

https_ports.description: The https port(s) of the device

IdentifyRequest.description: IdentifyRequest is a the request struct for the identify request.
IdentifyRequest.title: IdentifyRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

IdentifyResponse.description: IdentifyResponse is the response struct that is for identify requests.
IdentifyResponse.title: IdentifyResponse

Interface.description: Interface represents all interface values which can be read

OutputError.description: OutputError embeds all error messages which occur in requests on the API.
OutputError.title: OutputError

OutputMessage.description: OutputMessage represents a message of the response. It contains a message and a status code.
OutputMessage.title: OutputMessage

PerformanceDataPointInfo.description:
PerformanceDataPointInfo has all information to one performance data point as exported variables. It is returned by
PerformanceDataPoint.GetInfo()

Properties.description: Properties are properties that can be determined for a device
Properties.title: Properties

ReadAvailableComponentsRequest.description: ReadAvailableComponentsRequest is a the request struct for the read available-components request.
ReadAvailableComponentsRequest.title: ReadAvailableComponentsRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

ReadAvailableComponentsResponse.description: ReadAvailableComponentsResponse is a the response struct for the read available-components response.
ReadAvailableComponentsResponse.title: ReadAvailableComponentsResponse

ReadCountInterfacesRequest.description: ReadCountInterfacesRequest is a the request struct for the read count-interfaces request.
ReadCountInterfacesRequest.title: ReadCountInterfacesRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

ReadCountInterfacesResponse.description: ReadCountInterfacesResponse is a the response struct for the read count-interfaces response.
ReadCountInterfacesResponse.title: ReadCountInterfacesResponse

ReadInterfacesRequest.description: ReadInterfacesRequest is a the request struct for the read interfaces request.
ReadInterfacesRequest.title: ReadInterfacesRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

ReadInterfacesResponse.description: ReadInterfacesResponse is a the request struct for the read interfaces response.
ReadInterfacesResponse.title: ReadInterfacesResponse

ReadRequest.description: ReadRequest is the response struct that is for read requests.
ReadRequest.title: ReadRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

ReadResponse.description: ReadResponse is the response struct that is for read requests.
ReadResponse.title: ReadResponse

ReadUPSRequest.description: ReadUPSRequest is a the request struct for the read ups request.
ReadUPSRequest.title: ReadUPSRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

ReadUPSResponse.description: ReadUPSResponse is a the response struct for the read ups response.
ReadUPSResponse.title: ReadUPSResponse

ResponseInfo.description: ResponseInfo has all available information for a response. It also contains the RawOutput.
ResponseInfo.title: ResponseInfo

SNMPConnectionData.description: SNMPConnectionData includes all snmp connection data for a device
SNMPConnectionData.title: SNMPConnectionData

communities.description: The snmp community string(s) for the device

discoverParallelRequests.description: The amount of parallel connection requests used while trying to get a valid SNMP connection

discoverRetries.description: The retries used while trying to get a valid SNMP connection

discoverTimeout.description: The timeout in seconds used while trying to get a valid SNMP connection

ports.description: The snmp port(s) of the device

versions.description: The snmp version(s) of the device

Value.description: Value represents a value that was read out from a device.
Value.title: Value
